    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act(float delta)
        Updates the actor3d based on time. Typically this is called each frame by Stage3d.act(float).

        The default implementation calls Action3d.act(float) on each action and removes actions that are complete.

        Parameters:
        delta - Time in seconds since the last frame.

      • hit

        public Actor3d hit(float x,
          float y)

      • remove

        public boolean remove()
        Removes this actor3d from its parent, if it has a parent.
        See Also:
        Group#removeActor(Actor)

      • addListener

        public boolean addListener(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.EventListener listener)
        Add a listener to receive events that hit this actor3d. See #fire(Event).
        See Also:
        InputListener, ClickListener
